meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV (Matrix or center-weighted metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens, at 20 deg.C/68 deg.F) 2 to 20 EV (Spot metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens at 20 deg.C/68 deg.F)
accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
batterybatteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL14/EN-EL14a EN-EL14: 1900 mAh (TBD), EN-EL14a: TBD
liveviewautofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected
flashsyncspeed: Up to 1/200 sec, Synchronizes with shutter at 1/200s or slower
liveviewlensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time-servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (MF)
frameadvancerate: Up to 5 fps (manual focus, mode M or S, shutter speed 1/250 sec or faster, and other settings at default values)
flashmode: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with redeye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
picturecontrol: Standard Neutral Vivid Monochrome Portrait Landscape selected Picture Control can be modified
acadapter: AC Adapter EH-5b; requires Power Connector EP-5A
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
operatingenvironment: 32 to 104 deg.F (0 to 40 deg.C) Less than 85% (no condensation)
playbackfunctions: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9 or 72 images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, auto image rotation and image comment (up to 36 characters)
autofocussystem: Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
selftimer: 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; 1 to 9 exposures
focuspoint: Can be selected from 11 focus points
shutterreleasemodes: Continuous high, continuous low - Delayed remote - Quick Response Remote Mode - Quiet shutter-release - Self-timer mode - Single-frame [S] mode
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 4.8in x 3.8in x 2.9in (124 x 98 x 75.5 mm)
meteringmethod: Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8-mm circle in center of frame Spot: Meters 3.5-mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
dustreductionsystem: Image Sensor Cleaning Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
monitorsize: 3-in./7.5-cm, approx. 921k-dot (VGA) TFT LCD with 160° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage, and brightness adjustment
liveviewafareamode: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) Focus can be locked by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
scenemodes: Auto - Auto [Flash Off] - Portrait - Landscape - Child - Sports - Close up - Night portrait
fileformat: NEF (RAW): 12 bit, compressed JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx. 1:4), normal (approx. 1:8) or basic (approx. 1:16) compression NEF (RAW) + JPEG: Single photograph recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG formats
pictureangle: Approx. 1.5× lens focal length (35 mm format equivalent); Nikon DX format
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 420-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600 or SB-400; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
shutterspeed: 1/4000 to 30 sec. in steps of 1/3 EV, Bulb
compatiblelenses: Autofocus is available with AF-S and AF-I lenses; Autofocus is not available with other type G and D lenses, AF lenses (IX-NIKKOR and lenses for the F3AF are not supported) and AI-P lenses; Non-CPU lenses can be used in mode M but the camera exposure meter will not function The electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster
movieaudio: Built-in microphone, monaural - Optional external stereo mini-pin jack (3.5mm diameter) - Microphone sensitivity can be adjusted"
exposuremeteringsystem: TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal and Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
guidenumber: 39/12, 43/13 with manual flash (ft/m, ISO 100, 68 deg.F/20 deg.C) Approx.
builtinflash: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M: Manual pop-up with button release
exposuremodes: Programmed Auto with flexible Program (P) - Shutter-Priority Auto (S) - Aperture-Priority Auto (A) - Manual (M) - Auto - Auto (flash off)
focusmodes: Single-servo AF (AF-S) - Continuous-servo (AF-C) - Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) - Full-time Servo (AF-A) available in Live View and D-Movie only - Face-Priority AF available in Live View and D-Movie only - Wide area available in Live View and D-Movie only - Normal area available in Live View and D-Movie only - Predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status - Manual focus (M) with electronic rangefinde
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit such as SB-910, SB-700, SB-400, SB-300 is fully charged
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); Continuous-servo AF (AF-C); Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A); Predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status
filesystem: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras PictBridge
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
interface: Hi-speed USB Video output: NTSC, PAL HDMI output: Type C mini-pin HDMI connector Accessory terminal: Remote cord: MC-DC2 (available separately); GPS unit: GP-1 (available separately)
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning
